backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles, daily reports, submissions, and new check-in/check-out types with access-controlled CRUD functions and in-memory maps.
backend/migration.mo: Adds empty check-in and check-out maps to the old actor state during migration.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping features to affected files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of all frontend files and their roles in routing, UI, hooks, KPI logic, and submissions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light and dark theme color variables and global layout rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, authentication gating, profile setup, and routes for check-in, daily activities, check-out, and monitoring.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with a sign‑out action when authorization fails.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Initial profile setup form allowing users to save their name and dedication.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Authorization wrapper that shows children only if caller role matches allowed roles.
frontend/src/components/kpi/KPIScoreBadg: Displays a KPI score card with total and per‑category breakdown, applying color coding based on score levels.
Provides the main layout with header, navigation, and role‑based menu options, handling sign‑out and routing.
frontend/src/components/monitoring/KPITa: Renders a KPI table for submissions with principal names, category scores, totals, and loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, providing identity loading, login, logout, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on profiles, submissions, check‑ins, and check‑outs using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/kpi.ts: Defines KPI activities and computes total and per‑activity KPI scores based on completed tasks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, then renders App into the root element.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides a login interface using Internet Identity with descriptive UI and a sign‑in button.
frontend/src/pages/MonitoringDashboardPa: Displays performance metrics, submissions, check-ins, and check-outs with filtering and statistical summaries.
Allows principals to submit check-ins with optional notes and view recent check-in history.
frontend/src/pages/PrincipalCheckOutPage: Allows principals to submit check-outs with optional notes and view recent check-out history.
frontend/src/pages/PrincipalDailyFormPag: Renders a daily activity submission form that computes KPI previews and posts structured activity reports.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Provides helpers to convert bigint timestamps to Date and format them as date, time, datetime, or relative time strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them as needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugin configuration for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, features, requirements, and architectural notes for the SHQ Principal Daily Performance Tracker app.
